org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.api

Interface VertexHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ElementHandler, GraphElementHandler, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HBaseVertexHandler

    public interface VertexHandler
extends GraphElementHandler
    Responsible for reading and writing vertex data from and to HBase.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VertexHandler applyQuery(ElementQuery<HBaseElementFilter<org.gradoop.common.model.impl.pojo.EPGMVertex>> query)
      Applies the given ElementQuery to the handler.
      ElementQuery<HBaseElementFilter<org.gradoop.common.model.impl.pojo.EPGMVertex>> getQuery()
      Returns the element query or null, if no query was applied before.
      org.gradoop.common.model.impl.pojo.EPGMVertex readVertex(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result res)
      Reads the vertex data from the given Result.
      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put writeVertex(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put put, org.gradoop.common.model.api.entities.Vertex vertexData)
      Writes the complete vertex data to the given Put and returns it.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.api.GraphElementHandler

        readGraphIds, writeGraphIds

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.storage.hbase.impl.api.ElementHandler

        createTable, getPossibleRowKeys, getRowKey, isPreSplitRegions, isSpreadingByteUsed, readId, readLabel, readProperties, setPreSplitRegions, setSpreadingByteUsage, writeLabel, writeProperties, writeProperty
